title: Haunted Hospitals - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/21/19
itunes:title: Haunted Hospitals - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/21/19
description:
George Noory and paranormal investigator Richard Estep explore stories of ghosts that haunt hospitals, and the doctors and nurses who have seen encountered human spirits after death.
